```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
dat <- read.csv("../data/redcrab/Juneau/JNU_15_16_oceanAK_out_RAW.csv")

```

## CPUE from survey / data for CSA
```{r CPUE, echo = FALSE }
cpue_2016 <- read.csv("../results/redcrab/Juneau/JNU_CPUE_16.csv")
kable(cpue_2016, digits = 3)


# need to seperate time hauled to just have data hauled look for mid-date 
dat[1,7] # 6-22
dat[5097,7] # 6-29
# so mid-date would be 26th.
```
